mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.bp_id AS "bpId", a.product_id AS "productId", a.action_type AS "actionType", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM tjrb_bp_person_project a
ORDER BY a.id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tjrb_bp_person_project( ad_pic_url, product_id, ad_position, create_date, update_date ) VALUES ( #{adPicUrl}, #{productId}, #{adPosition}, #{createDate}, #{updateDate} )
